commentBody: Interesting query - and if we think about the many students who need remedial education, and then complain that they don't have a 'safe' environment when they encounter views different from their own ... whose fault is that?  Frankly, many, if not most, 18 year olds are not ready to go out & discover the real world, rural, urban, or suburban.  'We' have created a world where continued schooling is not just encouraged, but enforced for many.  18 year olds are really allowed to confront the 'real' world.
